page.title: 12AMATEUR DRAMATICS
page.content: There are two drama groups in Horsley:{The Nomads,}so called because they used to perform in various places but now have their own theatre, and the{WHIPS}(West Horsley Institute Productions)who have always performed in the West Horsley village hall. There are three age groups within each club:The Whips have the{Whippets} (12 years old and under),{Young Whips} (13_18 years old) and the{Whips}(19+). The Nomads have the{Young Nomes, Nomes and the{Nomads,}with similar age {groups}to the Whips.Both groups have to make their own scenery for their productions which occur about 3 times a year.If all age groups are included there could be as many as{6 } {productions per year. }
